author: Zack Budryk
title: Nearly 80 airlines cut capacity by 100 percent over coronavirus
description: A majority of airlines worldwide have cut capacity by 100 percent as a result of the coronavirus shutting down travel and grounding most flights.Of the 153 carriers, 78 have announced capacity cuts of 100 percent....
content:
A majority of airlines worldwide have cut capacity by 100 percent as a result of the coronavirus shutting down travel and grounding most flights.
Of the 153 carriers, 78 have announced capacity cuts of 100 percent. Additionally, almost 85 percent of airlines… [+3394 chars]
